Name: Average time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Original Manuscript Submission Confirmation'

Name: Total time between SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and SW-Checklist Completed across all variants
Metric: The sum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Minimum time it takes SW-Checklist Completed to be executed after SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Checklist Completed'

Name: Average duration of SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion compared to the duration of Plagiarism Originality Report Completed in the same case
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Plagiarism Originality Report Completed'

Name: Time elapsed from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to SW-Awaiting AE Assignment in variants that end with SW-EIC Reject
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Awaiting AE Assignment'

Name: Minimum time from SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to SW-Initial Reviewer Selection in variants involving reviewer assignment challenges
Metric: The minimum of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'SW-Initial Reviewer Selection'

Name: Elapsed time between SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission when the latter occurs before checklist completion
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'Co-Author Account Created During Manuscript Submission' and activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion'

Name: Cycle time of SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion measured from its occurrence to the next distinct non-system activity in the ACM journal review process
Metric: The average of the duration between activity SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion and the end of the case

Name: Average time it takes SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion to transition to Manuscript Export Succeeded in high-performance variants (performance < 500000)
Metric: The average of the duration between activity 'SW-Awaiting Checklist Completion' and activity 'Manuscript Export Succeeded'
